author: TravisEz13
body:
This issue to do to a portion of the work from #6463 

- [x] 1. Create a draft of the merged third part notice from  https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/ThirdPartyNotices.txt and https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/license_thirdparty_proprietary.txt into https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/ThirdPartyNotices.txt
- [x] 2. Have Legal review the draft, noting that we will add license.txt to the package
- [x] 3. Create PR wit the update
- [ ] 4. Add license.txt to all packages
title: Merge Third Party Notices
